fields.name: Truth by Any Means (C1)
fields.value: Faruzan can fire off a maximum of 2 Hurricane Arrows using fully charged Aimed Shots while under a single Wind Realm of Nasamjnin effect.

fields.name: Overzealous Intellect (C2)
fields.value: The duration of the Dazzling Polyhedron created by The Wind's Secret Ways increased by 6s.

fields.name: Spirit-Orchard Stroll (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Wind Realm of Nasamjnin by 3. 
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Divine Comprehension (C4)
fields.value:
The vortex created by Wind Realm of Nasamjnin will restore Energy to Faruzan based on the number of opponents hit: If it hits 1 opponent, it will restore 2 Energy for Faruzan. Each additional opponent hit will restore 0.5 more Energy for Faruzan. 
A maximum of 4 Energy can be restored to her per vortex.

fields.name: Wonderland of Rumination (C5)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of The Wind's Secret Ways by 3. 
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: The Wondrous Path of Truth (C6)
fields.value: Characters affected by The Wind's Secret Ways' Prayerful Wind's Gift have 40% increased CRIT DMG when they deal Anemo DMG. When your own active character deals DMG while affected by Prayerful Wind's Gift, they will fire another Hurricane Arrow at opponents. This effect can be triggered once every 3s.
